vipClub.description: Let's Win VIP Club is an exclusive system of VIP rooms, offering a luxurious gaming experience tailored for the elite. With sophisticated, private spaces and exclusive services, Let's Win VIP Club asserts itself as the premier destination for those seeking a high-end experience at Vietnam's most prestigious casinos.

stage1.title: ENTER ABOVE BEYOND
stage1.description: Be the first to discover a curation of exclusive offers, upcoming events and indulgences at its finest at Let's Win Club.

fineDining.title: Fine Dining Restaurants
fineDining.description: Discover the culinary arts at these fine dining restaurants in Singapore, Let's Win Club. Unravel layers of exquisite flavors from the finest ingredients, brought to life by exceptional expertise.

romanticRestaurants.title: Romantic Restaurants
romanticRestaurants.description: Transform any evening into a memorable occasion with the intimate ambience at these romantic restaurants. Perfect for celebrating anniversaries, engagements or simply savouring a special date night.

specialOccasions.title: Special Occasions
specialOccasions.description: Commemorate lifes most precious moments and add a dash of elegance to any occasion at these immaculate restaurants. Elevate your birthday bash to new heights with refined culinary creations.

shoppes.title: Discover the Shoppes
shoppes.description: With an impressive selection of over 170 designer labels and luxury boutiques, your search for the finer things ends here. Spoil yourself with a captivating accessory to add some sparkle to your day, or find the perfect gift for that special someone.

responsibleGambling.title: RESPONSIBLE GAMBLING
responsibleGambling.subtitle: A Commitment to Our Patrons
responsibleGambling.description: Our commitment to creating unforgettable experiences extends to every facet of our resort â€“ right down to the casino floor.

paiza.title: THE PAIZA COLLECTION
paiza.intro: Reserved for the most discerning, the Paiza Collection embodies the ultimate home away from home, with unmatched luxury, thoughtful detail and boundless artistry at every turn.
paiza.description1: From discreet entrances to lavish ensuite facilities, every aspect of our finest suite collection is designed for privacy and comfort. Host elegant parties in our opulent dining rooms, customise your suite with varied entertainment options and bask in spectacular views of Singapore's cityscape and sparkling sea. Soothing eucalyptus timber, Italian Palisandro Blue marble, artisanal porcelain and silver accents and the finest handmade Savoir beds invite touch and ensure unrivalled comfort.
paiza.description2: Enjoy privileged access to Paiza Sky Residence, a private club lounge nestled atop our landmark hotel. Discover a world of rarified, insider experiences such as golf, wine tasting and yachting.
paiza.description3: Throughout your stay, our 24-hour butler team is on hand to anticipate your every wish, with a resolve to make anything possible.
paiza.description4: Welcome home to the Paiza Collection, a truly exceptional stay.

0.title: Paiza VIP Arrival
0.description: Touch down to a warm welcome with our dedicated greeters. Arrive in our new VIP arrival lounge via a private driveway and lobby accessible only to Paiza guests.

1.title: Exclusive Butler Service
1.description: Experience personalized 24-hour butler service, ensuring your every need is met with utmost attention and care.

2.title: Private Sky Lounge
2.description: Access the exclusive Paiza Sky Residence, offering panoramic views and premium services.

3.title: Curated Experiences
3.description: Enjoy bespoke experiences from private dining to yacht adventures, tailored to your preferences.

aboveExpectation.title: ABOVE ALL EXPECTATION
aboveExpectation.description1: Perched on the highest floors of our iconic building, the Paiza Collection showcases breathtakingly grand yet serene interiors featuring lofty ceilings, luxuriantly plush furnishings and the finest materials, captivating artworks and superb views.
aboveExpectation.description2: An array of stunning objet co-created with top international artisans â€” such as Fromental's stunning hand-painted silk wallcoverings, Zanetto's jewel-like brass vessels and Legle Asia's lotus-adorned porcelainware â€” beguile the eye at every turn, surrounding you with beauty.
aboveExpectation.description3: From elegant soirees to deep rest, even the tiniest details have been carefully finessed for your comfort and pleasure.

premierRoom.title: Let's VipPremier Room
premierRoom.description: Unwind in your elegant room and savour the generous curation of treasures in the bespoke Armoire. Expect beautifully appointed in-room amenities and two-person bathtub, along with separate vanities.

paizaExperience.title: The Paiza Experience
paizaExperience.description: Revel in the pinnacle of sophisticated living at the new Paiza Collection. Discover the extraordinary world of Paiza and enjoy a taste of the privileges within.

packages.title: A Paradise That's Tailored to You
packages.description: Explore stay packages curated for families, couples and individuals with discerning taste, curious minds and an appetite for adventure

room.title: Let's VipPremier Room
room.description: Unwind in your elegant room and savour the generous curation of treasures in the bespoke Armoire. Expect beautifully appointed in-room amenities and two-person bathtub, along with separate vanities.

skypark.paradise_title: A Paradise That's Tailored to You
skypark.discover_text: From 17 Jan, discover the past, present and future of Let's Win Club at Skyline Singapore: Stories From Above, a new showcase at SkyPark Observation Deck.
skypark.explore_text: Explore the city from a new vantage point at 56 storeys high, where the scenic view of Singapore's world-class cityscape is uniquely breathtaking. Feast your eyes on the lush Gardens by the Bay and the city's iconic landmarks, such as the durian-shaped domes of the Esplanade.
skypark.evening_view: In the evening, the observation deck also offers a spectacular view of Spectra.
skypark.sunset_experience: For a more intimate viewing experience, opt for Sunset in the Sky, an exclusive programme complete with priority access via a private entry point, dedicated seating areas and premium dining menu.
skypark.notice_text: SkyPark Observation Deck will close on the following dates at 9pm for Silent Disco Full Moon Parties (Last entry at 8pm)
skypark.location_text2: Entrance to the SkyPark Observation Deck is accessible via the Hotel Tower 3 driveway.

opening_hours.question: What are the opening hours for Let's VipSkyPark?
opening_hours.answer1: Let's Vip SkyPark â€” including the Observation Deck â€” is open from 10am to 10pm. Non Peak Hours: 10am â€“ 4.30pm (Last entry 4pm), Peak Hours: 5pm â€“ 10pm (Last entry 9.30pm).
opening_hours.answer2: The Observation Deck may be closed for private events or commercial commitments at certain times. Please call ahead at +65 6688 8826 to check if the Observation Deck will be open on the day you wish to visit.

weekday_escapade.title: Weekday Escapade
weekday_escapade.description: Experience the newly restored Let's VipPremier Room, stylishly fitted with a deep soaking bathtub and walk-in wardrobe. Begin each day with a sumptuous breakfast buffet, and take a dip in our world-famous SkyPark Infinity Pool.

infinityPool.title: SKYPARK INFINITY POOL
infinityPool.description: Gain a whole new perspective at the largest rooftop infinity pool in the world. Float among the clouds, bask in the sun or lounge under swaying palm trees at our iconic eyrie, 57 storeys above the glittering city.

location.title: Location
location.text2: Entrance to the SkyPark Observation Deck is accessible via the Hotel Tower 3 driveway.
